Key Match Events: San Diego Padres scored five runs in the top of the ninth inning, turning the game in their favor
Post-Match Reflections: Ketel Marte and Lourdes Gurriel Jr. expressed frustration about the loss and defensive plays
Manager Torey Lovullo acknowledged the strong defensive efforts but noted the team's struggles to execute when it mattered
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a must-win for the Arizona Diamondbacks to keep their playoff hopes alive
Defensive plays, including a spectacular diving stop by Manny Machado, robbed potential base hits
Euduardo Rodriguez pitched 4.2 solid shutout innings with four hits and two walks
Kevin Ginkel, Joe Mantiply, Ryan Thompson, and Justin Martinez threw shutout baseball to bridge the game to the ninth inning
